===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|竝|曰|ls=ic}} – two figures ({{lang|zh|竝}}) changing places. Two top components have been simplified from {{zh-l|*立}} to {{zh-l|*夫}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[substitute]]
# [[for]]; [[in place of]]
#* {{zh-x|他 替 我 去 了 趟 超市。|He went to the supermarket '''for''' me. [Originally, I was the person who should go to the supermarket]}}
#* {{zh-x|奴才 替 天下百姓 感激 皇太后 恩典！|I, '''on behalf of''' the people throughout the world, [hereby] express my gratitude for the kindness of the empress dowager!|ref={{w|zh:苍穹之昴 (电视剧)|The Firmament of the Pleiades}}}}
